SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ1_QUESTION: Can I use iSunFA for free?
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ1_ANSWER: Yes, iSunFA's beginner version is permanently free. Users can experience the platform's basic features without subscribing or binding a credit card, including uploading vouchers, AI recognition for automatic voucher conversion, and generating financial reports such as the balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement.
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ2_QUESTION: If I add team members, can we share the ledger?
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ2_ANSWER: In iSunFA’s Professional and Enterprise versions, users can add multiple team members to share the ledger and set different role permissions, such as Administrator or Viewer. The beginner version also allows creating one team but does not support sharing the ledger with other users.
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ3_ANSWER: Financial statement automation is a continuous auditing feature that automatically updates the Balance Sheet, Income Statement, and Cash Flow Statement. Available to Professional and Enterprise users only; Beginner users must download reports manually.
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ4_QUESTION: What payment methods can I use?
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ4_ANSWER: Currently, iSunFA supports online payment methods, including credit cards (MasterCard, Visa, and JCB). Credit card payments allow automatic deductions to ensure subscription continuity.
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ5_QUESTION: How can I contact the sales team?
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ5_ANSWER: If you have further needs or require special plans, you can contact us via email. Our email contact is contact@isunfa.com.
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ6_QUESTION: How can I upgrade my plan mid-subscription?
SUBSCRIPTION_FAQ.FAQ6_ANSWER: You can upgrade your iSunFA plan at any time. The process is simple—log into your account and go to the 'Subscription Management' page to choose an upgrade or plan change. You can cancel your subscription at any time, but the current paid plan will remain effective until the next renewal date, and the payment made for this cycle is non-refundable.

PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.AVAILABLE_TB: Trial balance feature available for quick account validation
PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.AVAILABLE_LEDGER: Ledger feature that supports complete financial tracking
PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.DAILY_DOWNLOADABLE: On-demand analysis and daily-downloadable financial data
PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.HOMOMORPHIC_ENCRYPTION_BLOCKCHAIN: Industry-leading homomorphic encryption with blockchain certification
PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.30_DAYS_ON_TEAM_CREATION: A 30-day Professional plan trial starts automatically upon team creation via Google login; after the trial, accounts will downgrade to the Beginner plan unless subscribed
PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.LIMIT_3_MEMBERS_PAID_EXTENSION: Up to 3 members; add more for +$89 per member
PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.AUTO_EMBED_DISCLOSURE: Supports continuous audit with embeddable, auto-updating financial disclosures
PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.META_LLAMA:
* Meta Llama3.2-Vision 11B — coming soon
* Llamm3.2-FFM 11B — coming soon
* Llama3.3-FFM 70B — coming soon
PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.TURN_KEY_AND_MCP: Turn Key Solution, Model Context Protocol (MCP) — coming soon
PLANS_FEATURES_VALUE.NOTE_DES:
Meta Llama3.2-Vision 11B is well-suited for automatically recognizing and processing image-based accounting documents such as invoices, scanned reports, and handwritten bookkeeping slips.
* Llama 3.2-FFM 11B is a Traditional Chinese optimized model tailored for finance and financial management. It is suitable for financial report generation, forecasting, audit support, and financial summarization.
* Llama 3.3-FFM 70B is a larger-scale Traditional Chinese optimized model with higher accuracy, especially suitable for complex accounting analysis, strategic recommendations, and automated auditing. It can integrate multi-source data to generate ESG reports, provide high-level decision-making suggestions, and perform anomaly detection.
